value:
They say a bride is most radiant on
her wedding day, yet none more so
than my dear Juno. I am a lucky man!

The harsh realities of mercenary life
have torn many Ilian clans apart.$k$pIn the end, as long as Ilia herself
benefits, she will always endure.

I hope Thea and Shanna find partners
worthy of them. I suppose after that,
it won't be long until they're wed.

I would like nothing more than a day
with my Juno—not as a fellow soldier,
but as a loving husband.

Juno and I first met on an Etrurian
battlefield. She had been hired by
our enemy.$k$pRather than fight, I tried to reason
with her. Things just...grew from
there.

I'm Zelot, mercenary captain of Ilia's
knights. Please accept this gift from
$Nf.

I swear that I will protect you no
matter the cost, down to the very
last fiber of my being.

The truth is that I only do this to
make others happy. Yet who am
I to argue with self-improvement?

Ilia's knights make their living as hired
muscle. Our reputation is everything.
It does us no good to get sloppy.

As long as this power is mine, no
harm shall come to those whom
I love. I swear it as a knight of Ilia.

I am Zelot, mercenary captain of Ilia's
knights, and husband to my beloved
Juno. How may I be of service?

I cannot thank you enough for inviting
me to such a wonderful festival,
$Nu.$k$pOrdinarily, us soldiers spend all our
time finding a way to survive long
enough to see another sunrise.$k$pSuch a life can be difficult for those
in love. I'm sure my dear Juno often
worries about me. And I about her.$k$pBut seeing her smile, radiant in her
wedding dress... That is a gift I can
never hope to repay.$k$pThat sight alone is more than enough
to convince me that everything we've
gone through has been worth it.$k$pI will do whatever it takes to see that
smile again. Rest assured that as long
as I'm here, I will protect us all.
たあっ
止める！
うあっ
服が…
Blessed day.
This, I swear to you.
A vow of love.
I will protect you!
I am sorry, Juno...
Sigh...
I am unused to this attire. Does it...suit me?
Woah! I'm uneasy enough without you doing your best to unman me.
We had a small ceremony... Nothing so grand as all this.
Forgive me. Seeing Juno looking so radiant...it gladdens my heart.
It's my day to be teased by Shanna and the rest. Ah, well.
As long as I live, you will be safe. This I swear.
I'm a little nervous, but I take courage knowing you are by my side.
I do.
Oh?
I'm a little nervous.
